title: Mini-Ep 261: The World Needs More Stories

itunes:subtitle: Kate mistakes nail glue for bitter nail polish and Doree recaps her journey with Invisalign. Then, listeners ask for comfy house slipper recs, the best micellar water, and offer up a great foundation rec.  - To leave a voicemail or text for...
description:
Kate mistakes nail glue for bitter nail polish and Doree recaps her journey with Invisalign. Then, listeners ask for comfy house slipper recs, the best micellar water, and offer up a great foundation rec. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
